basics.name: Lucas Castro
basics.label: Senior Front-end Engineer @ Faster | TypeScript, Vue, React, UX, Accessibility & Performance
basics.summary:
I'm a front-end developer with a passion for building scalable, high-performance web applications and components. I strongly believe that the value of an application is directly tied to its usability and accessibility.

Currently exploring the world of Open Source, publishing and contributing to projects that benefit both the community and other developers.

work.name: Faster (fstr)
work.summary: Currently working on the development of the Faster front-end platform.
highlights: Migrated the entire codebase from Vue 2 to Vue 3, reducing build time by 80%.
Led the development of a custom components library.
Integrated platform analysis tools such as Hotjar and Sentry.
Managed the AWS infrastructure supporting the front-end.
Accelerated the onboarding and ramp-up process for new developers.
Documented and implemented unit tests for components and services.
